Package business.entities.Characters

Class Paladin

java.lang.Object
business.entities.Characters.CharacterGame
business.entities.Characters.Paladin
public class Paladin extends CharacterGame
Class to represent the specific behaviour and traits of a Paladin entity. Implements the methods from the CharacterGame interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • Paladin

      public Paladin(String name, String player, int xp, int body, int mind, int spirit, String classType)
      Constructor with the parameters to create a character.
      Parameters:
      name - a string containing the name of the character.
      player - a string containing the name of the player who owns the character.
      xp - an integer containing the number of experience points that the character has.
      body - an integer representing the stat "body" of the character.
      mind - an integer representing the stat "mind" of the character.
      spirit - an integer representing the stat "spirit" of the character.
      classType - a string containing the class of the character.

    • attack

      public String[] attack(List<Monster> monsters, int target, int multiplier, List<CharacterGame> party)
      Method to calculate the damage the character attack is going to do.
      Overrides:
      attack in class CharacterGame
      Parameters:
      monsters - list of monster Monster instances.
      target - integer with the index of the monster Monster instance which is going to be attacked.
      multiplier - integer with the multiplier of the attack.
      party - list of character CharacterGame instances.
      Returns:
      a string array with the number of hit points the attack is going to deal and extra information if needed.
